title.en: Supervising Science Related Activities in Non-formal Settings

structural_units.address:
Vanemuise 46
51003 Tartu linn, 
Tartu linn, Tartumaa 
EST

description.en: In this course the task of non-formal  and formal education  similarities and  differences will be studied, It deals with  non-formal science course planning in accordance with the laws and meaningful carrying out the course.
description.et: Õppeaines  käsitletakse  mitte-formaalse ja formaalse hariduse erinevusi ja sarnasusi, teadushuviringi vormilist planeerimist vastavalt seadustele ning sisulist läbiviimist.

objectives.en: The general goal of the Supervising Science Related Activities in Non-formal Settings  Course is to develop students knowledge  and skills  for successful supervision of activities in non-formal  settings course.
objectives.et: Aine  üldeesmärgiks on anda tulevastele teadushuviringi juhendajatele vajalikud teadmised ja oskused ringi juhendamiseks.

learning_outcomes.en: By the end of the course the student:
1. knows the similarities and differences of  non-formal and formal  education and  understand how to support student development;
learning_outcomes.et: 1.	teab mitteformaal- ja formaalhariduse erinevusi ja sarnasusi ning võimalusi nende kaudu  toetada noorte arengut;

learning_outcomes.en: 2. is aware  of the laws that regulate youth-work in Estonia and is able to draw up a curriculum and action plan for non-formal science course;
learning_outcomes.et: 2.	tunneb teadushuviringide tööd reguleerivat seadustikku ning oskab kirjutada teadushuviringi töökava;

learning_outcomes.en: 3. is aware of the term "scientific literacy"  and is able  to support the development of scientific literacy with different teaching and learning methods
learning_outcomes.et: 3.	teadvustab loodusteadusliku kirjaoskuse kujundamise vajadust teadushuviringi tunnis ning oskab kasutada erinevaid meetodeid loodusteadusliku kirjaoskuse arendamisel;

learning_outcomes.en: 4. is aware  of the national curriculum  and is able to  support the development of general  and field specific competences with non-formal science course.
learning_outcomes.et: 4.	omab ülevaadet põhikooli ja gümnaasiumi riiklikust õppekavast ning oskab seda seostada teadushuviringi  tegevuskavaga
